Post.title: Redis Notification
Post.content:
redis keyspace notification PHP

redis

product:#id hash
set

data type key description
set product_ids
hash product:#id
1:

redis 

HMSET product:1 name "- 54g*4/" price 55 stock 256
HMSET product:2 name "Lays 97g/" price 32 stock 179
HMSET product:3 name "150G"  price 59 stock 326
HMSET product:4 name " 240g/" price 42 stock 324
HMSET product:5 name "171g/" price 64 stock 64
HMSET product:6 name "-" price 53 stock 182
HMSET product:7 name "" price 49 stock 313
HMSET product:8 name "BBQ" price 55 stock 158
SADD products 1
SADD products 2
SADD products 3
SADD products 4
SADD products 5
SADD products 6
SADD products 7
SADD products 8

redis keyspace notification


redis keyspace notification

keyspace notification keyspace
redis

  1. key key keyspace
  2. key keyevent

Redis PUB/SUB Redis PUB/SUB
Redis PUB/SUB channel, channel,
Redis keyspace notification Redis channel,
channel

keyspace notification redis.conf notify-keyspace-events 

notify-keyspace-events "KEA"


K - Keyspace events
E - Keyevent event
A - All commands
KEA
redis

redis PUB/SUB redis channel 

1. PUBLISH __keyspace@<db id>__:<key name> <command type>
2. PUBLISH __keyevent@<db id>__:<command type> <key name>

PSUBSCRIBE 

1. PSUBSCRIBE __keyspace@*__:*
2. PSUBSCRIBE __keyevent@*__:*

del test1 test2 test3 test4 keyspace keyevent channel

127.0.0.1:6379> PSUBSCRIBE __keyspace@*__:test*
Reading messages... (press Ctrl-C to quit)
1) "psubscribe"
2) "__keyspace@*__:test*"
3) (integer) 1

127.0.0.1:6379> PSUBSCRIBE __keyevent@*__:del
Reading messages... (press Ctrl-C to quit)
1) "psubscribe"
2) "__keyevent@*__:del"
3) (integer) 1

key

127.0.0.1:6379> set test1 test1
OK
127.0.0.1:6379> set test2 test2
OK
127.0.0.1:6379> set test3 test3
OK
127.0.0.1:6379> set test4 test4

terminal redis-cli test* del

keyspace 

127.0.0.1:6379> PSUBSCRIBE __keyspace@*__:test*
Reading messages... (press Ctrl-C to quit)
1) "psubscribe"
2) "__keyspace@*__:test*"
3) (integer) 1
1) "pmessage"
2) "__keyspace@*__:test*"
3) "__keyspace@0__:test1"
4) "set"
1) "pmessage"
2) "__keyspace@*__:test*"
3) "__keyspace@0__:test2"
4) "set"
1) "pmessage"
2) "__keyspace@*__:test*"
3) "__keyspace@0__:test3"
4) "set"
1) "pmessage"
2) "__keyspace@*__:test*"
3) "__keyspace@0__:test4"
4) "set"

127.0.0.1:6379> PSUBSCRIBE keyevent@*:del redis-cli del
test, tests, test3, test4

127.0.0.1:6379> del test1 test2 test3 test4
(integer) 4

keyspace (127.0.0.1:6379> PSUBSCRIBE keyspace@*:test*) 

1) "pmessage"
2) "__keyspace@*__:test*"
3) "__keyspace@0__:test1"
4) "del"
1) "pmessage"
2) "__keyspace@*__:test*"
3) "__keyspace@0__:test2"
4) "del"
1) "pmessage"
2) "__keyspace@*__:test*"
3) "__keyspace@0__:test3"
4) "del"
1) "pmessage"
2) "__keyspace@*__:test*"
3) "__keyspace@0__:test4"
4) "del"

keyevent (127.0.0.1:6379> PSUBSCRIBE keyevent@*:del)

1) "pmessage"
2) "__keyevent@*__:del"
3) "__keyevent@0__:del"
4) "test1"
1) "pmessage"
2) "__keyevent@*__:del"
3) "__keyevent@0__:del"
4) "test2"
1) "pmessage"
2) "__keyevent@*__:del"
3) "__keyevent@0__:del"
4) "test3"
1) "pmessage"
2) "__keyevent@*__:del"
3) "__keyevent@0__:del"
4) "test4"

key keyspace keyevent
key key key key

Predis PHP redis

redis-notify 

mkdir redis-notofy

composer Predis Async, Predis
composer composer
Predis Async Predis Async

composer.json 

{
  "require":{"predis/predis-async":"dev-master"}
}

composer install Packagist Predis-Async

compsoer install

Predis notify.php

redis
LocalStorage
Predis Async product*
redis keyspace notification key channel
channel 

__keyspace@*__:product:*

channel channel 

channel  __keyspace@0__:product:1
channel  hset

channel key product:1 key 1 id
channel key hset

github demos redis-notify 

simon@simon:~/demos/redis-notify$ php notify.php 
id: 1
name: - 54g*4/
price: 55
stock: 256
----------------------------------------------
id: 2
name: Lays 97g/
price: 32
stock: 179
----------------------------------------------
id: 3
name: 150G
price: 59
stock: 326
----------------------------------------------
id: 4
name:  240g/
price: 42
stock: 324
----------------------------------------------
id: 5
name: 171g/
price: 64
stock: 64
----------------------------------------------
id: 6
name: -
price: 53
stock: 182
----------------------------------------------
id: 7
name: 
price: 49
stock: 313
----------------------------------------------
id: 8
name: BBQ
price: 55
stock: 158
----------------------------------------------

redis client 

simon@simon:~/demos$ redis-cli
127.0.0.1:6379> HMSET product:9 name ' ' price 469 stock 79
OK
127.0.0.1:6379> HMSET product:9 name ' ' price 469 stock 75
OK
127.0.0.1:6379> DEL product:9
(integer) 1
127.0.0.1:6379>

notify.php 

 product_store :
id: 9
name:  
price: 469
stock: 79

 product_store :
id: 9
stock: 75

 product_store :
id: 9

redis redis redis
redis SET
